content: संनिकर्षः {@--1@} Drawing near, bringing near. {@--2@} Vicinity, proximity; presence; उत्कंठते च युष्मत्संनिकर्षस्य <ls>U. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 74</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 8</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Connection, relation. {@--4@} (In Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab>) Connection of an organ of sense (इंद्रिय) with its object (विषय); this is of six kinds.
